projects.title: Best Practices for EKS Setup
projects.description: Reference architecture for setting up an EKS cluster with best practices. This includes setting up a VPC, IAM roles, GitOps configuration via ArgoCD, and an example CI/CD pipeline.

projects.title: Github Template with Github Best Practices
projects.description: For developers who want to start a new project with best practices in mind. This template includes a README with a project overview, a CONTRIBUTING.md file, and a CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md file. It also includes tool integrations like Renovate, Github Actions with CI/CD pipelines, and other code scanning tools
